name: Chicken Escape Story 2018
description:
Run as fast as you can!

Break from the evil farm and get a taste of the rural outdoors! You are a silly cartoon chicken trapped inside a barn. You want to be reunited with all your animal friends. Go on an adventure and travel a road chock full of obstacles as your master tries to chase you. Solve riddles, leap over windmills and water wells, run across bridges, fight villagers and farmers, dodge farm tractors and trucks, and battle against animal enemies! Cattle and sheep will block your way. Use special buttons like jump and slide, or dash. Collect points the more challenges you pass.

Help silly chicken escape by dodging hurdles. This game is full of fun packed missions and excitement waiting for you! Experience awesome 3D farm graphics and addictive gameplay!

Try different playing modes: endless and career mode, to enhance the fun!


Chicken Escape Story 2018 Features:
• Amazing 3D farm and village environment!
• Addictive game play!
• Easy navigation with tap and swipe buttons!
• Awesome, innovative visual and sound effects!
• Enjoy endless or career mode!
